metadata.synopsis: Player comments on the strange markings on the door. If they have the key, they comment that they look similar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays when the players get near the treasure room door in the secret sun passage.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Quite an elaborate door, for a tunnel underground.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Oh. I saw a key earlier with those same markings.
